text: The men's 4x100 metres relay event at the 1996 World Junior Championships in Athletics was held in Sydney, Australia, at International Athletic Centre on 25 August. ==Medalists== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center; " width="35%" |- |bgcolor="gold"|Gold|| Vince Williams Jerome Davis Obea Moore Lawrence Armstrong ' |- |bgcolor="silver"|Silver|| Vincent Caure Didier Héry Ruddy Zami David Patros ' |- |bgcolor="CC9966"|Bronze|| Peter Missingham David Baxter Paul Pearce Paul Di Bella ' |} ==Results== ===Final=== 25 August {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center" |- !Rank !!
